name: Idiopathic Pulmonary Hemosiderosis
chief_complaint: I keep coughing up blood and feel short of breath all the time
prognosis: Variable; may progress to pulmonary fibrosis with poor long-term outcomes without treatment
description: A rare condition characterized by recurrent diffuse alveolar hemorrhage leading to hemosiderin deposition in the lungs. The exact etiology is unknown but may involve autoimmune mechanisms. Typically presents in childhood but can occur in adults.
